programme.title: THE VESSEL
programme.desc: When a crack team of paranormal investigators lead by the Samsa foundation; enters an abandoned turn-of-the-century prison looking for answers to a two decade old murder of a wrongly executed man. The team, lead by Daniel Samsa (John Holgren) commissions the executed mans daughter Carrie (Daisy Leonard) and an ex-con; Hector (Dan Herrera) to summon the spirit of the executed man. Along with the help of a psychic drifter named Jason Brooks (Stu Brumbaugh) and his intuitive friend Frank (Mick ODay) the team soon learns that the mystery theyre pursuing isnt nearly as horrifying as the secrets hidden inside the jail itself. Once they find themselves and the prison on full lock-down, they must try and escape or come face to face with the terrible evil locked within.

programme.title: BIRTHDAY
programme.desc: Ms trade is sex, but sex doesnt sell the way it used to; what clients are searchingis love. M is the highest-paid professional of the many girls at Scarlets, but even on her 25th Birthday, its business as usual. Instead of celebrating, her day is spent answering the silent prayers of Father Phillip. He has lost faith in providing counsel to her colleagues, the vivacious Lily and troubled Cindy. Amidst the many dramas that unfold and the demands of the no-nonsenseScarlet, Ms secret birthday wish goes unanswered, that is, until Joey knocks on her door; a young man, forgotten by the world, who has never learned to love or even how to kiss. But Joey also has a secret, its his Birthday too, and today M might discover that even the slightest, most unexpected wish can come true. Birthday encompasBirthday love, first times, humanity, and the discovery of intimacy in surprising and unexpected places.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 25
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 57
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.desc: Hola y bienvenido El Top Ocho, donde contamos los ocho videos más divertidos de la semana!

programme.title: El Top 8
programme.desc: Hola y bienvenido El Top Ocho, donde contamos los ocho videos más divertidos de la semana!

programme.title: El Top 8
programme.desc: Hola y bienvenido El Top Ocho, donde contamos los ocho videos más divertidos de la semana!

programme.title: Videos Divertidos
programme.desc: ¡Prepárate para los 10 videos más divertidos de AFV!

programme.title: Videos Divertidos
programme.desc: ¡Prepárate para los 10 videos más divertidos de AFV!

programme.title: PAI PROBLEM
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Magic Fort overnight. Negu sends a mutant that’s a clone of Pai. Pai has to defeat himself using his own self-knowledge.

programme.title: Christmas Ring Ring
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: APPRENTICE ALERT
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in his inventive mood and rigging up a new treat for his customers. In streak Basha chased by Sundar and the two mess around the kitchen while Chai Raja has stepped out for a second. As he tosses stuff to keep Sundar at bay, Basha accidentally makes a couple of special jalebis. Chai Raja steps back in and the two freeze mid-motion. Chai Raja scoops out the simmering jalebis and sniffs, his nose wrinkling. Sundar eagerly points at Basha sure that the monkey is sure to get in trouble this time, but much to his chagrin, Basha is hired- as an apprentice!! As Sundar glumly waits at the tables, Basha (the show-off) not only builds an acrobatic rapport with Chai Raja and makes life miserable for Sundar, but also manages to gobble up fries on the sly. Sundar has to find some means of getting Basha fired and tries to sneak in and mess with Bashas batter. But he ends up only making it better and earning Basha more pats on his back. The MP arrives and Chai Raja wants to show off his new apprentices skills Basha is in the spotlight and sure to crack under the heat. Sundar, meanwhile ready to be rid of Basha in any manner possible, sticks dynamite in the batter. Basha, stumped as to what to cook , hastily shapes up the batter into an inviting cake. Seeing a wick, the MP lights it- and slices...KABOOM! Both Basha and Sundar, trod with heavy shoulders out the tea stall as a charred Chai Raja signals they are fired.

programme.title: Final Attack
programme.desc: The Guardians fall out with each other and start training separately. But that very day, Negu decides to send out ALL his mutants at the same time. Xia and Pai are captured and April has to descend to the Chou World to free them. By working as a team and using the mutants’ weaknesses against them, they finally defeat them all.

programme.title: Melody's Powerful Music
programme.desc: Sneevil creates a powerful magnet to draw an iron asteroid towards Smightyland. Melody must summon her power of rock to blast the asteroid out of the sky before its too late.

programme.title: Sneevil Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: Train Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is in for a calm and peaceful train journey. And then the hilarious pests enter the scene. The trio is having a time of their life; but at the cost of Don and Colonel. Their train journey is a colossal disaster. But, would the rats get away with it?? He he hell no!

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: RAIN IN KELIFORNIA
programme.desc: It is monsoon time and the teashop is leaking at various places. The customers are irritated with rain drops trickling on their head, clothes and even into their tea tumblers. And they start leaving the shop. A tensed Chai Raja orders Sundar to put a sheet over the roof. Sundar obediently and effectively does it and comes back. But Basha seizes the opportunity and wants to have some fun. It is leak marathon in the teashop with a group of suffering customers, angry Chai Raja and a panic stricken Sundar. At last when the entire roof flies off and it is literally monsoon inside the teashop, Basha stylishly comes outside the shop holding a giant umbrella. And all the customers run under it and have their steaming teas and snacks. An angry Chai Raja whacks Sundar and ask him to learn something from the smart Basha!

programme.title: Let Me Fly
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: A Cola Fix !!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are into a new business – COLONEL COLA!!! But there are three unwanted partners – of course the rats! With them running loose in the factory, the dogs have a hard time keeping themselves alive, let alone the business stand. Business turns into a busy mess.

programme.title: Dragonfish Lake
programme.desc: The twins are out skateboarding and delivering newspapers to homes around Abra-Dabra, but Uncle Charlie warns them it can be dangerous as it might hit someone. But thinking of the possibility of the idea, Charlie tries a hand at throwing a newspaper onto Tiggy’s lawn, but ends up flying in through the window. On hearing a scream, Charlie rushes in apologising for hitting Tiggy, but it turned out that Tiggy was moaning for what he read in the newspaper. It was about a contest of the Chef Challenge Award featuring whether Tiggy’s rival, Chef Alfonse could win it. Tiggy always wanted to win the challenge but never knew what original recipe to make. Tiggy gets jealous as he reads Chef Alfonse’s fish-a-la mode recipe that he promises to create the dish himself and if turns out to be really good as the newspaper says it is, he will admit how good his rival really is. So Tiggy waits a long while at the lake to catch a fresh fish as the recipe calls for it. Soon all his friends come over to help him fish, each with their very own fish lines. Seems a little magical assistance can help this time. But the lake is now occupied by one big playful dragon fish. The dragon fish turns out to be really hungry, so Tiggy sets out to make the biggest beetroot and berry snack ever. The dragonfish gulps it all down happily, but Deedee is sad she couldn’t really help Tiggy with the recipe. Tiggy on the other hand is quite ecstatic that he was able to whip up the most original dish ever. So over pancakes the next day Tiggy discovers that he has been awarded the annual Chef Challenge Award for the most original beetroot and berry recipe based on the photo and information Deedee gave to the judges. Tiggy is delighted to see an appreciative comment by Chef Alfonse that Tiggy’s surprise-a-la dragonfish being totally top-notch.

programme.title: Stone Soup
programme.desc: WI-Go the traveler is starving and has nothing but his brain. He ends up making the most delicious soup in the world using a mysterious stone without using a single penny.

programme.title: Cricket Match
programme.desc: Keet and Cat decides to play a game of cricket in the backyard with their own set of teams.

programme.title: Tarot Tales
programme.desc: A fake yogi loses his forecasting parrot and is in search for a replacement. As he passes by GrandPA’s house he sees Keet and wants him as his fortune telling parrot.

programme.title: Beach Fight
programme.desc: Its Dunky’s day off as he packs a small basket and heads to the beach .He starts making a sand castle and is very happy with it…

programme.title: BIG BUNNY
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to prepare a big feast. Pai sees this as his chance to impress the Elders and earn a new weapon to replace his Mystic Stick. But when he goes to collect the rare striped carrot (a crucial ingredient for his dish), he’s attacked by a Giant Bunny Mutant sent by Negu. His Mystic Stick helps him defeat the Mutant, so he’s content with his weapon…for now.

programme.title: TEA N TUNE
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in form splashing and whipping his frothy tea wowing his customers when suddenly the radio goes bust. Chai Raja freezes, his creative- tea affected and try as hard as he can, he can barely hold up a can- forget all the acrobatics he was normally capable of. Sundar tries his best (rigs up music with utensils, hashed-up instruments etc) to restart Chai Raja but except for the assault on ears, there is little effect on Chai Raja who stays slumped, dazed. Customers are thinning. And Basha is getting desperate since his only source of yummy food is Chai Raja. For once Sundar and Basha decide to team up together. They try to bring into the hotel all sorts of silly wacky instruments, and all kinds of musicians (from carnatics to Hindustani to pop to rastafarians) and even some crazy loud speakers to cheer up Chai Raja. But nothing! The squabble escalates till there is outright mayhem that ends in Sundar and Basha crashing into the radio. It starts playing again and Chai Raja, zaps to his skilful self and gets to chai-juggling again. Customers pop back in again and Sundar is happy, until he finds Basha gobbling food and dashes to chase him off.

programme.title: Count it out
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: Dimsum To Go
programme.desc: A bowl of lip smacking Dimsums and four pair of eyes. Don tries his best to hide it but in vain! Watch Don and the mice chase each other in this quest.

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: APPLECART UPSET
programme.desc: The Fruit Ninjas, Mark Samurai, Durian grey and Sensei meet at DFS burger for a final showdown

programme.title: Imaginary Friend
programme.desc: As Gummy starts spending more and more time with his imaginary friend, Harry and Kala soon start wondering if he’s nuts – or they are!

programme.title: A Bumpy Trek
programme.desc: Don and Colonel went up the hill, to feast a platter, Colonel fell down and broke his bones and Don came tumbling after. Rocky terrain of the magic mountain and a sleepy Don is indeed a disastrous combination. So what you think awaits the team on the peak of this mountain?

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: Bored
programme.desc: Kala is bored, and Gummy and Harry’s attempts to snap her out of it wind up having unexpected results.

programme.title: "Water, Water Every Where"
programme.desc: GrandPA takes the trio for a small ride to the nearby towns newly opened mini waterpark. Cat is all excited and is wearing water goggles and a snorkeling gear.

programme.title: Paper Cups
programme.desc: What could our DIY make with a paper cup? Lets find out

programme.title: PET PEEVES
programme.desc: April tries for Xia’s attention, but he’s too busy doting on his new pet bird, Peachy Woo. Pai loves his new pet fish, Noodle. April suspects Peachy Woo of being the mutant the Elders have warned the Guardians about, but it turns out to be…Noodle!

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: The Note
programme.desc: Team Racing is introduced. Speed, X and Annalise are on one team. When Analise is made team captain they must get over their differences for the good of the team. Before the race Annalise is contacted by the Shadowy woman who tells her that a saboteur will enter the race and attack the Mach 6. She orders Annalise to aid the saboteur. It seems like Annalise might but at the last moment takes the hit and saves Speed and the Mach 6. While investigating where the saboteur came from, Speed and the gang discover a tear in the virtual track. The saboteurs got in through the tear, which leaves the school vulnerable to attack. Conor patches the tear but they have to find the source. Since the virtual track is temporarily closed the Racer Academy is invited to race at the Alpha Academy. Tipped off by Speed Sr., Speed and Conor investigate and find the source of the virtual tear. They chalk it up to competitive sabotoge, but we find out that the Alpha Academy is connected to the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: The Macaroni Plant
programme.desc: Gummy is determined to grow his favourite food – even if macaroni plants don’t exist!

programme.title: Imaginary Friend
programme.desc: As Gummy starts spending more and more time with his imaginary friend, Harry and Kala soon start wondering if he’s nuts – or they are!

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: Beach Boys
programme.desc: The sun shining bright up in the sky, what a perfect day to laze around on the beach! But the beach boys are in for some mean surprises! Stolen picnic baskets, flying sandwiches, mixed up sun tan lotions and shark attacks.

programme.title: Dress code
programme.desc: The twins find themselves in a world where they can’t get into a party because they’re not wearing the right clothes.

programme.title: Seashell
programme.desc: Bring the beach closer to you with this DIY!

programme.title: Space Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel stare at the moon maps and rockets. And along with Charly Marly and Lary, their rocket leaps out from earth and into outerspace. Meteors flash past and they land on a new planet, will they ever make it back to earth again???

programme.title: GLOVE OF THE SOUTH
programme.desc: Negu is thrilled to learn there is a Glove of the South hidden on the Guardians’ island. He sends a big-eyed mutant, The Finder, to find the glove and bring it to him. The Guardians try to stop The Finder, but fail. Luckily, when Negu dons the Glove of the South, it tickles him mercilessly! The Glove of the South was a trick, invented by the Elders!

programme.title: Comet Run
programme.desc: X begins acting strangely, creating tension with Speed and the others. When X leaves to join the Shadowy Organization, Speed decides to infiltrate the Shadowy Org to save him. Speed soon discovers that X is working undercover. When Xs cover is blown, he and Speed must try and escape the Shadowy Organization HQ with the missing Part.

programme.title: SWITCHING PLACES
programme.desc: After arguing about whose avatar is more difficult to control, Xia and April swap magic accessories. Xia becomes the Panther Warrior and April becomes the Dragon Warrior. Unfortunately, just as they’re struggling to control each other’s avatars, Negu’s latest mutant attacks: his beloved pet “cat,” Kanna. The Guardians manage to capture Kanna, so Mei, Koto, and Amkko race to the Yan World to retrieve her – which is just what the Guardians want!

programme.title: BADminton
programme.desc: Marco & Polo are playing badminton in the backyard like a sweet family. Then the shuttle cock falls on Cats head as he is about to catch Keet.

programme.title: Dragonfish Lake
programme.desc: The twins are out skateboarding and delivering newspapers to homes around Abra-Dabra, but Uncle Charlie warns them it can be dangerous as it might hit someone. But thinking of the possibility of the idea, Charlie tries a hand at throwing a newspaper onto Tiggy’s lawn, but ends up flying in through the window. On hearing a scream, Charlie rushes in apologising for hitting Tiggy, but it turned out that Tiggy was moaning for what he read in the newspaper. It was about a contest of the Chef Challenge Award featuring whether Tiggy’s rival, Chef Alfonse could win it. Tiggy always wanted to win the challenge but never knew what original recipe to make. Tiggy gets jealous as he reads Chef Alfonse’s fish-a-la mode recipe that he promises to create the dish himself and if turns out to be really good as the newspaper says it is, he will admit how good his rival really is. So Tiggy waits a long while at the lake to catch a fresh fish as the recipe calls for it. Soon all his friends come over to help him fish, each with their very own fish lines. Seems a little magical assistance can help this time. But the lake is now occupied by one big playful dragon fish. The dragon fish turns out to be really hungry, so Tiggy sets out to make the biggest beetroot and berry snack ever. The dragonfish gulps it all down happily, but Deedee is sad she couldn’t really help Tiggy with the recipe. Tiggy on the other hand is quite ecstatic that he was able to whip up the most original dish ever. So over pancakes the next day Tiggy discovers that he has been awarded the annual Chef Challenge Award for the most original beetroot and berry recipe based on the photo and information Deedee gave to the judges. Tiggy is delighted to see an appreciative comment by Chef Alfonse that Tiggy’s surprise-a-la dragonfish being totally top-notch.

programme.title: Where’s Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: An Eerie Hustle
programme.desc: Don finally gets to play tit for tat with the mice and they are running for their lives. Don’s house turns into haunted house and the ghost of Don is hungry for some dead meat preferably dead mice meat.

programme.title: The 22.30 Express – Little Red Riding Hood Case 2
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the story of LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD, having been called out by her and her GRANDMOTHER. When the detective and her assistant arrive, they discover that it has been a year since the FEROCIOUS WOLF unsuccessfully tried to eat LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her GRANDMOTHER. Since then, the FEROCIOUS WOLF has been in jail, while LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her GRANDMOTHER became the most popular and best-loved people in the community. Everything changed a week ago, when a series of mysterious crimes began in the village and the surrounding area. Everything would seem to indicate that these were committed by LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her GRANDMOTHER, who all the villagers now hate. SANDRA and FO must find the real culprit, to demonstrate the innocence of LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her sweet GRANDMOTHER

programme.title: King Zac
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Zoo Trip
programme.desc: Chaos unfolds as Chottu Mottu Lambu Don and Colonel decide to make a trip to the zoo. Starting from feeding the animals, from sneaking into the control room and opening the enclosures and racing crocodiles, they mess it all.

programme.title: Even More Difficult – The Beauty & The Best
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the tale of Beauty and the Beast, having been called out by BEAUTY. The BEAST has mysteriously disappeared, just when she had come to love him. The Detective and her assistant must find him before the magic rose in the garden loses its last petal.

programme.title: A “Bumpy” Trek
programme.desc: Don and Colonel went up the hill, to feast a platter, Colonel fell down and broke his bones and Don came tumbling after. Rocky terrain of the magic mountain and a sleepy Don is indeed a disastrous combination. So what you think awaits the team on the peak of this mountain?

programme.title: You Don’t Say
programme.desc: PANCAKE and ODESSA’S friendship is strained when the young otter unknowingly offends Odessa. In the Zooniverse, Pancake learns a lesson when he and the Zoonicorns picnic in Echo Canyon where hurtful words which turn into irritating little creatures, Words can hurt.

programme.title: Brains Math Problem
programme.desc: rain’s alter ego Braianna has a reputation as a clumsy C student. When her math teacher pushes her to it, she blurts out the correct answer to an impossible equation, leading Mr. Fractal to assume she must be cheating. He demands a meeting with her parents, and her Fake Robot Parents nearly blow her cover.

programme.title: Robo-Gummy
programme.desc: Finding himself over-committed to too many things, Gummy orders a few duplicate robots of himself... who winds up in the end causing more trouble than they’re worth!

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: Planet Gadget
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: See The Problem
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: The Jokester
programme.desc: Zaps silly pranks on his friends go too far and he finds himself all alone to fight Sneevil. A hilarious dance off between Zap and Biggs will determine who will get control of the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Tell Me Your Wish
programme.desc: A new friend visits the Unknown Forest. Its Annie, Cabers adventure-loving cousin. Its love at first sight for Duda. Wanting to impress, Doubt tells a little white lie and announces to everyone that there is a magic box by the Hot Hot Springs that grants wishes. He borrows Scots box and hides inside as if he were the genie in the box. His friends come and each makes a wish, forcing Duda to do everything he can to grant them. Finally, its Annies turn. Unfortunately, she wishes for a fluffy white cloud. Not wanting to disappoint Annie, Duda tries his hardest to literally reach for the sky. Somehow, Annie realizes that it was Duda with the magic box all along. Seeing that he struggles to catch a cloud for her, she decides to change her wish...

programme.title: The Forest Without Magic – Rapunzel
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the tale of RAPUNZEL, having been called out by RAPUNZEL herself. She can’t stand being locked up in the tower for a moment longer; she wants to discover the world and escape from the clutches of the odious WITCH once and for all. The Detective and her assistant help RAPUNZEL to escape from the tower, but the WITCH soon finds out that she has gone and sets off in hot pursuit. The WITCH is much more powerful than SANDRA had originally imagined and there is only one way for SANDRA, FO and RAPUNZEL to get out of this adventure alive: to reach the Forest Without Magic.

programme.title: BADminton
programme.desc: Marco & Polo are playing badminton in the backyard like a sweet family. Then the shuttle cock falls on Cats head as he is about to catch Keet.

programme.title: A Whole New Ballgame
programme.desc: The Moon in the Zooniverse has fallen from the sky and Odessa and the Zoonicorns must get it back to where it belongs. Sharing can be fun. Never give up.

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Cat notices that Katreena is a big fan of “macho man” a well built super star .He needs to build his physique and impress her.

programme.title: River of Time
programme.desc: An impatient Pancake must wait a WHOLE DAY to bake a cake with Mama but learns different methods of patience in the Zooniverse, where time keeps slowing down. How to manage waiting and delays with a bit of patience and optimism

programme.title: Froggy Friends
programme.desc: The frogs from the well are good friends of Keet so when ever Cat tries to enter the house to steal something from the kitchen they will croak and Keet.

programme.title: Poder De La flor
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: Final Attack
programme.desc: The Guardians fall out with each other and start training separately. But that very day, Negu decides to send out ALL his mutants at the same time. programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: A Ham in a Role 1949
programme.desc: A Shakespearian dog, tired of being a pie-in-the-face looney tune, quits Warner Brothers to study dramatic acting and goes to his country house to practice the bard. He finds that two polite twin gophers have taken over his abode and angrily throws them out. They retaliate by violently heckling him in comical accordance with his Shakespeare speeches.

programme.title: tulips shall grow madcap models no. u1-5-1942
I Never Changes My Altitude 1937
programme.desc: Popeye is sitting outside Olive's lunchroom at the airport, distraught. She's closed the business to fly away with an aviator (Bluto, of course). But it's hardly what she expected; he has her painting his plane, while it's flying; when she says she's rather go back to Popeye, he tries to throw her off the plane. Popeye sees this, and takes off in a plane, just in time to help her out. The boys get into a dogfight, and Bluto manages to demolish Popeye's plane. As Popeye is falling, he grabs a duck and feeds the duck spinach. The duck manages to fly him up to Bluto's plane, Popeye has some spinach of his own, and he teaches Bluto a lesson. Popeye picks up Olive and crashes the plane into the diner, opening it (and providing a new counter).

programme.title: Baby Buggy Bunny 1954
programme.desc: Baby-faced Finster robs a bank, but the baby carriage with the money in it goes down Bugs' rabbit hole.

programme.title: Spooking About Africa 1957
programme.desc: Casper is in an African jungle. He frightens a zebra at a watering hole. Wheezy the elephant has a terrible sneezing problem; he sneezes all the feathers off a peacock and a group of monkeys out of their perches. Casper decides to help, and in the process dislodges the feather that was making the elephant sneeze. But then a fire breaks out, and the elephant is unable to sneeze on command.

programme.title: Scotty Finds a Home 1935
programme.desc: A young anthropomorphic kitten wants a pet. He happens to find a puppy with no owner and takes him in. When the Scotty tracks mud into the house, Grandma says that her grandson cannot keep him. A transient bulldog is walking by as Grandma puts a pie in the windowsill to cool. He barges into the house and terrorizes the family, demanding they feed him. Scotty rushes back to the house and saves the family, causing Grandma to decide that they can keep him after all.

programme.title: You Can't Shoe a Horse Fly 1940
programme.desc: Hunky and Spunky are settling in for a nap, but a horse fly sees them and sees dinner. After battling the fly for a while, the youngster enlists dad's help. But the fly is merely stunned, and rallies a new attack, this time with friends. Father eventually kills the lot of them

programme.title: I Don't Scare 1956
programme.desc: Popeye has beaten Bluto to a date with Olive. Seeing that Olive is superstitious, Bluto changes the date to Friday the 13th, and proceeds to rig various proofs that bad things will happen if she goes out.

programme.title: The Paneless Window Washer 1937
programme.desc: On the outside of an office building, Popeye and Bluto duke it out as rival window washers.

programme.title: Pest Pupil 1957
programme.desc: Baby Huey, the over-sized duck, is enrolled in kindergarten but his size and clumsy attempts to fit in causes such havoc that he is expelled by the teacher. His mother then hires a private tutor, who is led a life of misery due to Huey's efforts to do good that unintentionally backfire. But the tutor winds up in the ocean---unless Huey lived on a shark-infested lake---and and is about to become a shark meal but Huey saves his life...and gets his diploma as a reward from the grateful tutor.

programme.title: Alberta Draw Tag Mule Deer
programme.desc: Embark on an extraordinary mule deer hunting adventure in Alberta with Ryan Kohler, Corey Cook, and Taylor Thompson. Follow the action as they pursue Corey's prized mule deer and Taylor's exquisite velvet deer.

programme.title: Women in the Wild
programme.desc: Step into the untamed world of \"Women in the Wild\" and follow Danielle and Darcy, two remarkable women who fearlessly pursue hunting on their own terms.

programme.title: Air Ivanhoe Adventures
programme.desc: Join Scott Stirling and Merle Parkin on their epic fishing and bear hunt adventure with Air Ivanhoe. Experience the Ontario wild like never before!

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: In this episode, we embark on a captivating journey as we follow Hunter through his first two seasons of Whitetail Hunting and his debut Black Bear season

programme.title: Whitetail Bow Hunting Across America
programme.desc: In this episode, we join Kevin on his first velvet whitetail hunt in Kentucky. We then join Wade in Central Texas as he meets up with an old friend to hunt whitetails in the Texas brush country.

programme.title: Whitetail Rut in Texas: Feast or Famine - Part 1
programme.desc: Wade and Steve are going after whitetail during the peak of the rut. This episode is as unpredictable as a buck during the rut and we can't wait to bring you all the action
